page.title: 05Entertainment in Soham
page.content: People in Soham like different sorts of{entertainment.}The most popular is {Television,}but there is a lot more entertainment for people to go to in Soham, for example various{Sports}and {Dances.}Other popular activities include{Reading, Music and Walking.}In Soham we have a Sports Hall, which the schools use as well as the public. The Sports Hall has many activities, such as 5-a-side Football, Basketball, Netball,Tennis,Badminton and Table Tennis. Some of the other activities which people enjoy in Soham are {Choir,Fishing,Social Club and Swimming {Club.}About half the people go outside Soham for their activities, like Cricket Club, Darts Team and Swimming Clubs.
